landingPage.title: Overview
landingPage.eachMember: Each member has 1 type of card. Total of 39 card types.
landingPage.clickHowToPurchase: Click "How to purchase" to buy it right away
landingPage.launches: NMB48 Digital Trading Card App Launches!
landingPage.nmb48Members: NMB48 members 40 peoples now can move and dance in unique digital trading cards！
landingPage.memberList: Abe Wakana, Ishida Yuumi, Izumi Ayano, Uno Mizuki, Umeyama Cocona, Okamoto Rena, Kato Yuuka, Kawakami Chihiro, Kawano Nanaho, Kojima Karin, Sadano Haruka, Shiotsuki Keito, Shibuya Nagisa, Jonishi Rei, Shinzawa Nao, Sugiura Kotone, Deguchi Yuina, Nakagawa Mion, Nakano Mirai, Hara Karen, Hirayama Mai, Hori Shion, Hongo Yuzuha, Maeda Reiko, Manabe Anju, Mizuta Shiori, Minami Haasa, Yasuda Momone, Yamasaki Amiru, Yamamoto Mikana
landingPage.internsList: Asao Momoka, Lee Siyeon, Orisaka Koharu, Kameno Zion, Kuroda Fuuwa, Satsuki Aika, Sumino Wakana, Hayakawa Yuna, Yoshino Misaki, Wada Miyu
landingPage.buyYourDigitalTradingCards: Buy your digital trading cards in our specialised marketplace!
landingPage.howToGetNMB48DigitalTradingCard: How to get NMB48 Digital Trading Card
landingPage.buyOnNMB48DigitalTradingCardMarket: Buy on NMB48 Digital Trading Card Market
landingPage.downLoadNmb48: Download “NMB48 Digital Trading Card App” from App Store / Google Play
landingPage.launchKEYRINGPRO: Launch KEYRING PRO and copy the private key of your account (in menu).
landingPage.returnNmb48Digital: Return to the NMB48 Digital Trading Card App and paste the copied private key.
landingPage.createAnAccount: Create an account according to the procedure
landingPage.allTheCardAndTransaction: All the cards and transaction information acquired so far will be carried over to the app account.
landingPage.whatIsNMB48: What is NMB48 Digital Trading Cards!!
landingPage.pressPlayButton: Press ‘Play’ button and NMB48 members will start moving!
landingPage.buyNMB48Tokens: Buy NMB48 tokens to buy and sell NMB48 digital trading cards in the Market
landingPage.useNMB48TokensToPurchase: Use NMB48 tokens to purchase NMB48 digital trading cards, or to buy and trade cards resold by users in the Market.
landingPage.usersCanTrade: Users can trade digital trading cards with each other!
landingPage.theCardMarket: The Card Market is an easy way for anyone to sell cards on the Card Market.
landingPage.usersCanSet: Users can set their own selling price and sell their digital cards.
landingPage.ifYouFind: If you find the card you want, click the Buy button to complete your purchase!
landingPage.youWillImmediatelyReceive: You will immediately receive the card you purchased in your album.
landingPage.rankingOfUsers: Ranking of users is based on the amount of NMB48 digital trading cards they own. The more NMB48 digital trading cards you own, the higher your ranking will be! The more NMB48 digital message trading cards you have, the higher your ranking will be. The higher the amount of cards you own, the higher your ranking.
landingPage.selectTheUserIcon: Select the user icon at the top of home screen
landingPage.selectTheQuantity: Select the quantity you would like to purchase and click 'Buy'
landingPage.theAppVersion: ※The app version will support more than just credit card payment
landingPage.useNMB48Tokens: Use NMB48 tokens from the market to purchase a pack of 3 cards!
landingPage.youCantChoose: ※You can’t choose type of card, 3 cards will be selected randomly out of 39 types.
landingPage.nmb48DigitalTradingCardApp1: NMB48 Digital Trading is in the card app.
landingPage.transferTheNmb48DigitalCard1: Transfer the NMB48 Digital Trading Card
landingPage.transferTheNmb48DigitalCard2: you already have to the app
landingPage.ifYouAlreadyHave: If you already have one of the “Christmas version, New Year's version, Momone Yasuda graduation commemorative limited digital card”, download the app this way.
landingPage.useThisApp2: to buy Digital Trading Cards easily and immediately!

createNFT.title: Create NFT
createNFT.documentFileDesc: File document should be a PDF, EPUB file and less than 20MB
createNFT.imageShouldBeAPNGJPGGIFFileAndLessThan2M: Image should be a PNG, JPG, GIF file and less than 2MB.
createNFT.imageShouldBeAPNGJPGGIFFileAndLessThan5M: Image should be a PNG, JPG, GIF file and less than 5MB.
createNFT.youCanInputMultiPhotosIntoYourNFT: You can input multi photos into your NFT (max 50 images)
createNFT.videoShouldBeAMP4OrMOVFileAndLessThan20M: Video should be a MP4 or MOV file and less than 20MB.
